name: HOOK AROUND
description:
Very evil beast has kidnapped all your friends and bought them to his underground world to consume their energy to keep him strong and powerful

you have to free all your friends to weaken the big evil beast power

after freeing everyone you will be ready to face the big evil beast 

but slowly will notice you have nothing to fight with so you only conclude to tire him up until he loses all his powers

.

For perfect experience download the game instead of playing it on browser (size is just 20-30 mb) 

.

Controls: 

r        to restart

esc       to pause

left mouse button        to point the hook

right mouse button/space         to start moving

scroll mouse           to zoom in and out

.

music from: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/retro-forest/451
